issue.title: [Packaging] Bintray descriptor files are no longer needed
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2962](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2962). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We're using Bintray for uploading built packages in apache/arrow-dist. We aren't using Bintray in apache/arrow. If we never use Bintray in apache/arrow, we can remove these files.

    .deb: https://bintray.com/kou/apache-arrow-apt/APT
    .rpm: https://bintray.com/kou/apache-arrow-yum/Yum
